name: Princess Nom Nom (Game IN)
description:
[The team made a prettier version since then, you can download it here : http://armelgibson.itch.io/princess-nom-nom]

Princess Nom Nom is a game in which you have to feed the Princess in order to make her grow bigger.

The prototype was made during the Game, Sun & Jam organized by Game IN. The theme was : "Obey must be a pleasure"

Team : Armel Gibson, Delphine Fourneau, Thomas Pattou, Matthieu Richez.
